chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 hopped onto Penelope the chick's 🐥 bedside table. "Ribbit! Medicine time! 10 PM sharp!" Every night, the same routine. One night, Penelope was too busy watching cat videos 😹. 10 PM came and went. Ferdinand found Penelope later, covered in glitter glue and feathers, convinced she could fly to the moon. 🚀 "See what happens when you skip your medicine, Penelope?" Ferdinand croaked. "Now you think you're a ✨space chicken!✨"
